👋 Hello!

I’m a husband and dad (now of 2!) from Colorado. On this site I share projects I’ve built and point others to fascinating people and ideas.

I started building this site in August 2019 as part of my personal commitment to “rigorous leisure.” My goal is to spend as much time as I can building little projects that I share with the world.

If you’d like to connect, I’m available on Twitter or email. If you’d like to support my work, you can buy me a coffee! Thank you for visiting!

What I’m working on currently:

  • Setting up Career Blues, my podcast about the meaning of work and the Good Life.

  • Optimizing conversions on my Shopify store, fintwit.store.

  • Taking an intro. to JavaScript course at Codecademy.

  • Increasing engagement for QuoteBot, my bot that collects quotes from friends and posts them to Twitter.

  • Reading Zapier’s ebook Introduction to API’s. If you’re curious like me, You can download the ebook for free here.
